title: Whoever denies Ahmedis Qaydianis are not Muslims are committing kufr? #Assim #assim assim al hakeem
transcript: Asam alikum Alum Salam when speaking about Ahmed and Muslims who don't consider them to be kafers someone said whoever denies kufur knowingly is a kafir did the person who said that commit a sin I don't understand if you're talking about Ahmed and you're saying that they're cfir who's denying it a Muslim so if he denies that they are not cafir out of ignorance and not knowing the kufur they have brought to the table yeah this is Forgiven because of his ignorance but if he knows that they reject that the prophet Muhammad Alat is the last and final messenger and they is no he's not and they say that Jesus Christ be pee upon him had this or that he died and and and the likes and that he would become a prophet or messenger they think think of their uh prophet and their IM to be a messenger of Allah Etc this is tot among so many things a whole list of kufur if he knows this and he still denies that they're kafer yes definitely he's an apostate cfer like them
